content: The reason I am leaving this review is to suggest that you recognise an NHS Number **without** the spaces: at the moment, if you enter the number as one long string of ten digits it is not recognised; if you then add the two spaces in the correct places it is recognised. content: If you are planning to travel using the vaccination status part of the app you will also find that you need a printed copy. When you do this via receipt of an email which gives you a link to the NHS to then print it off. But the printout does not print your full name, only your first name. It also says on the print "check against the bearer's identity". So you will fail the ID check as the names will not match. (See news reports about airlines refusing boarding due to mismatched documents).

content: I'm surprised by the number of critical reviews. I made the mistake of trying to use my passport page as photographic ID. It was too glossy so there were slight reflections and it was rejected. Having a more matt finish my driving licence worked well and the remainder of the process was straightforward. Other reviewers have criticised the need to start the whole process again if one element of the submission is rejected but I can understand why that may be necessary for security purposes.
replyContent: We are very happy to hear you enjoy using the NHS App. Your feedback is very important to us. Thank you. Please let us know if there's anything we can do to receive a 5-star rating from you.

content: I found installation of this app surprisingly easy on both own and wife's phone. What an improvement compared with the previous medical app where I needed photo and driving licence to match. content: First impressions: goodish, then became irritated when adding symptoms of vaccination side effects. Also, you can't re-edit a previously saved record to add missed optional data easily. You have go down another path.

content: Okay, it took a while to set up, but I got there eventually. After thinking about this the problem was me not the NHS. They have clearly worked very hard to create this app and on the one hand it has to be easy enough to use; but on the other, stringent enough to prevent unauthorised access by anyone other than the genuine user. Because of the sensitive nature f the information that the user has access to, it really has to make you jump through a few hoops. Having so said, now the app is on my phone, access is simple. I do however urge anyone to make certain you use lock screens or other forms of security protection. All in all I'm happy to give this app 5 stars.
